channel.title: Mysql Help

item.title: Mysql Help
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey Guys, what did i wrong ?

/* MYSQL Connections */ static{ try{Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"); String IP="127.0.0.1"; String DB="Scar"; String User="root"; String Pass="Secret"; connection = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://"+IP+"/"+DB, User, Pass); Misc.println("Connected to database!"); }catch(ClassNotFoundException e){ Misc.println("You Need To Download The SQL Classes"); }catch(SQLException e){ //misc.println("SQL ERROR... /////"+e); Misc.println("Count not connect to databse!"); } }

ERROR:

.\src\Server.java:278: cannot find symbol symbol : variable connection location: class Server connection = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://"+IP+"/"+DB, User, Pass); ^ 1 error Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .

Read full topic
